Welcome to our mobile app, a dedicated platform designed to bridge the gap between
parents and sports schools. We are a team of passionate students committed to making
the lives of parents easier and the management of sports schools more efficient.

Our app offers a range of features tailored to meet the needs of parents with children
attending sports schools. One of the key features is the ability to track your child’s attendance
in real-time, ensuring you’re always updated. Additionally, our app allows you to view the
class schedule, helping you plan ahead and keep track of upcoming classes and any changes.

We also understand the importance of knowing who is responsible for your child’s training.
Therefore, our app provides detailed information about each trainer, including their qualifications
and their approach to training. Furthermore, our app keeps you in the loop with all the latest
news and announcements from the sports school, ensuring you’re always the first to know
about any upcoming events or changes.

We believe in the power of sports and the positive impact it can have on a child’s life. Our
mission is to make it easier for parents to be a part of this journey by providing them with the
tools they need to stay connected and informed. Join us in our mission to revolutionize
the way parents interact with sports schools. Together, we can make a difference.
